Item.name: Empty Soul Tank
Item.description: A tank used to contain spiritual essence, disguised as a nitrogen tank to evade detection by nonbelievers.

Item.name: Soul Tank
Item.description: A tank used to contain spiritual essence, disguised as a nitrogen tank to evade detection by nonbelievers.

Item.name: Ritual Paintbrush
Item.description: Used to create ritualistic pentagrams. Pentagrams can easily be destroyed, but cannot be removed, so you should place them wisely.

Item.name: Summoning Pentagram
Item.description: A summoning pentagram for the usage of bringing living entities into the world. Cannot be safely removed once it is placed.

Item.name: Advanced Summoning Pentagram
Item.description: A summoning pentagram used to bring entities into the world. Cannot be removed once it is placed.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Phantom)
Item.description: A dark incantation that summons a Phantom, a ghost which can consume souls.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Static)
Item.description: A dark incantation that summons a Static, a ghost which can damage electronics and blind victims.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Malevolence)
Item.description: A dark incantation which summons a Malevolence, a weak ghost which freezes its victims.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Demon)
Item.description: A dark offering which summons a Demon, a powerful ghost which burns its victims and has many spells.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Abyssal Thrall)
Item.description: A dark offering which summons an Abyssal Thrall, an entity from the surface layers of the Abyss.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Abyssal Aerosolizer)
Item.description: A dark offering which summons an Abyssal Aerosolizer, a surface layer abyssal entity that brings a choking fog with it.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Abyssal Mimic)
Item.description: A dark offering which summons an Abyssal Mimic, a surface layer abyssal entity skilled in misdirection and infiltration.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Crawler)
Item.description: A dark offering which summons a Crawler.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Mudraptor)
Item.description: A dark offering which summons a Mudraptor.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Mudraptor Veteran)
Item.description: A dark offering which summons a Mudraptor Veteran.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Husk Hardsuit)
Item.description: A dark offering which summons a special armored husk.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Husk Caustic)
Item.description: A dark offering which summons a special acidic husk.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Husk TITAN)
Item.description: A dark offering which summons a special TITANic husk.

Item.name: Summoning Spell (Cultist Workstation)
Item.description: A dark offering which solidifies a summoning circle's roots in this world, making it more powerful and impossible to destroy.

Item.name: Occult Incubator
Item.description: A tank filled with biofluids necessary for the gestation of Husk-type occult items.

Item.name: Husk Container Pet
Item.description: Insert Calyx Extract to awaken the dormant husk within.
